channel.title: I am a complete noob, please help me out =D
channel.description: yeah iJUST started this, and i have NO CLUE how to make items or anything, any help would be appreciated (I heard something about item ID's, is there a list of the item IDs somewhere?) :)

item.title: I am a complete noob, please help me out =D
item.dc:creator: @Nooblet101 Nooblet101
item.description:
@Nooblet101 wrote:

I am on Hybridscape at the moment, and i just read the FAQ (I thought it was just what you should and shouldnt post, but i was wrong!) but i was looking for a list thats like alphabeticle or something (i apologize for the spelling). And another thing i have problems with is spawning items in my inventory, i did the Rune 2hander, and for money i can only do one at a time, and when i try to do more it says “Wrong Syntax”

Read full topic
